title: Guide
summaries: The Guide is usually the first NPC a player encounters. He spawns near the player when the world is created. He provides tips mainly aimed at new players and displays crafting recipes (including the crafting station required) of items shown to him.

Unlike most other NPCs, the Guide spawns upon world creation, before a <linked>house</linked> is available. He will, however, move into the first house built. If he is killed, a proper house will need to be built before he can respawn, but he has no additional requirements.

On the <linked>[img:Desktop version]</linked><linked> Desktop version</linked>, <linked>[img:Console version]</linked><linked> Console version</linked>, and <linked>[img:Mobile version]</linked><linked> Mobile version</linked>, the Guide will defend himself against nearby enemies using a <linked>Wooden Bow</linked> and arrow, firing <linked>Wooden Arrows</linked> initially and then upgrading to <linked>Flaming Arrows</linked> in <linked>Hardmode</linked>. He deals 8 / <linked>12</linked> / <linked>14</linked> damage at the start of the game, and as players progress, he will gain <linked>various stat increases</linked>.
